9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir narrated:"I saw the Messenger of Allah stoning the Jimar with what was similar to pebbles for Al-Khadhaf

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْجِمَارَ الَّتِي يُرْمَى بِهَا مِثْلُ حَصَى الْخَذْفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: The Jimar Are Stoned With Pebbles Similar To Al-Khadhf
